content: Most people are in a state of consumption, not creation. Most people are in a state of skepticism and scarcity, not gratitude and abundance. Most people are in a state of passivity, not activity. Yes, common sense is not common action. Simply take the first step and gain something out of it will make a big difference. We have to learn to embrace the difficulty, it’s worth it. The point about confidence is valuable as well. Confidence comes from your previous performance. No wonder I have no confidence.
